name: Ersfjordbotn
description: Sheltered fjord beach with wide northern horizon. One of the most popular spots near Tromsø.
access: 25 min drive from Tromsø center, parking at beach

name: Sommarøy
description: Scenic island with white sand beaches and minimal light pollution.
access: 50 min drive from Tromsø, bridge-connected island

name: Rekvik, Kvaløya
description: Remote fishing village on Kvaløya's north coast. Very dark skies.
access: 40 min drive from Tromsø, paved road

name: Telegrafbukta
description: City beach on Tromsø island's southern tip. Convenient but some light pollution.

name: Prestvannet Lake
description: Hilltop lake with panoramic views. Easy walk from city center.
access: 20 min walk uphill from Tromsø center

name: Grøtfjord
description: Dramatic fjord setting with mountains on both sides. Excellent dark sky location.

name: Haldde Observatory
description: Historic aurora observatory. Worth the detour for aurora enthusiasts.

name: Tromvik
description: Small fishing village at the end of the road on Kvaløya. Very dark, wide horizon.

name: Kaldfjord
description: Fjord village on Kvaløya's east side. Protected from city lights by mountains.

name: Brensholmen
description: Ferry terminal area with wide ocean views. Great for clear northern horizon.
access: 55 min drive from Tromsø, whale watching area

name: Fjellheisen / Fløya
description: Cable car viewpoint 421m above Tromsø. Panoramic 360° views but exposed to wind.
access: Cable car from city center, or 2h hike

name: Husøy, Senja
description: Picturesque fishing village on Senja island. Dramatic mountain backdrop.

name: Skibotn
description: Inner fjord location with very stable clear weather. Home to aurora observatory.
access: 1.5h drive from Tromsø, often clearer weather

name: Lyngen
description: Fjord valley backed by the Lyngen Alps. Rain shadow means less cloud cover.

name: Vengsøya
description: Small island north of Kvaløya accessible by passenger ferry. Incredibly dark.

name: Sandnessund Bridge Area
description: Bridge crossing to Kvaløya. Pull-off areas with decent northern views.

name: Nordkjosbotn
description: Junction town at head of Balsfjord. Often clearer than coastal Tromsø.

name: Arctic Cathedral Area
description: Mainland side near the Arctic Cathedral. Quick access from city with some city glow.
access: 5 min drive from city center, across the bridge

name: Hella, Kvaløya
description: Quiet area on Kvaløya's southwest coast with good northern exposure.

name: Strand
description: Mainland area north of Tromsø bridge. Mountain backdrop blocks some city light.
